item.title: How to make a tele for admins?
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

[quote=“suomirunee, post:3, topic:243933”][quote author=kapstok link=topic=320289.msg2536053#msg2536053 date=1226753190]
how can anyone give me the code?
[/quote] I can give you a tele command for admins: if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("yourcommandnamehere") && playerRights >= 2) { sendMessage("MESSAGEHERE"); teleportToX = xxxx; teleportToY = yyyy; }
Change yourcommandnamehere to what you want to be the name of the command
Change MESSAGEHERE to the message you want it to send on the admin’s chat.
Change xxxx and yyyy to the x and y coords you want it to teleport, to see coords, type ::coordson[/quote]
Seriously, why is it all commands commands commands with you people.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a tele for admins?

item.title: How to make a tele for admins?
item.dc:creator: @suomirunee suomirunee
item.description:
@suomirunee wrote:

[quote=“kapstok, post:1, topic:243933”]how can anyone give me the code?[/quote] I can give you a tele command for admins: if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("yourcommandnamehere") && playerRights >= 2) { sendMessage("MESSAGEHERE"); teleportToX = xxxx; teleportToY = yyyy; }
Change yourcommandnamehere to what you want to be the name of the command
Change MESSAGEHERE to the message you want it to send on the admin’s chat.
Change xxxx and yyyy to the x and y coords you want it to teleport, to see coords, type ::coordson

Read full topic
